name: A Page Turns
description:
Overview

A Page Turns is a 3D escape room adventure that takes place between the pages of a pop-up book. Playing as a child trapped in their Playroom, you must transport between the room and a magical book to find clues and collect items to escape! 

Keyboard Controls

WASD - move 

Mouse - rotate camera

Developed and Designed by: 

Laura Meng 

Christy Ye 

Composed and Sound Designed by: 

Ariana Lobrutto 

Justin Petrovych 

Special thanks to Peter Brinson, Cameron Williams, and the Class of CTIN 532, FA2021.
